articles.title: Golden Peacock Award
articles.imageContent: Sterlite Tech has been honoured with the Golden Peacock Award for Excellence in Corporate Governance - 2017.  Sterlite Tech was selected by the Awards Jury under the Chairmanship of Justice (Dr.) Arijit Pasayat, former Judge, Supreme Court of India. The award will be presented during Golden Peaco ...
